name: Solitaire (itch) (Yukumura)
description:
This game prototype was developed in 2018 in seven days as an "exam" for an Italian company and reports the following features:

  • Fully functional gameplay in portrait mode;
  • Animations of cards (card flip and translations);
  • Calculation of the score;
  • Ability to undo a move;
  • Pause menu;
  • Home screen home;
  • Presence of sounds;
